short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: A simple Chrome extension that shows sports data in the sidebar

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Sports Sidebar allows you to easily track your favorite sports events in real-time. Perfect for multitaskers who want to stay informed while browsing the web.
